Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 61st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1984...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1985 (Going to STL: P T. Burns, 2B M. Lemke. Going to CHC: P B. Burns)...
Injured on 6/28/1988 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1989, off Scott Garrelts (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1989, off Dave Stieb (LA)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1989, hitting .311 with 7 HR, 94 RBI...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/14/1991 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 10/4/1993...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/24/1994 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
